title: 114_s2065
content: The "Working Student Act of 2015" is the short title of this Act, which provides support for working students. The Act amends income protection allowances for dependent and independent students under the Higher Education Act of 1965 for the academic year 2016-2017. The Act modifies income protection allowances for independent students with dependents other than a spouse for the academic year 2016-2017. The Act modifies income protection allowances for independent students with dependents other than a spouse for the academic year 2016-2017. The income protection allowance for families with different sizes and number of college students is provided in a table. The Act adjusts income protection allowances for independent students with dependents other than a spouse for the academic year 2016-2017. A table shows the income protection allowance for families of varying sizes and number of college students. Additional income adds $5,950. The Higher Education Act of 1965 is amended to update income protection allowances for independent students for academic years after 2016-2017. The Secretary will publish revised tables in the Federal Register. The Higher Education Act of 1965 is amended to update income protection allowances for independent students for academic years after 2016-2017. The dollar amounts in the table will be adjusted based on the estimated percentage increase in the Consumer Price Index. The amendments to the Higher Education Act of 1965 update income protection allowances for independent students based on the Consumer Price Index, effective July 1, 2016.
